typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Nom Fournisseur Principal} as string,
		Clients as string,
		{Code Agence} as string,
		{Libellé Agence} as string,
		{Code postal agence} as string,
		{Ag Siret} as string,
		Siren as string,
		MKT1 as string,
		MKT2 as string,
		MKT3 as string,
		{Reference Fournisseur} as string,
		Libelle as string,
		{Qté Livré Mois A} as string,
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1} as string,
		{Qté Livré Cumul A} as string,
		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1} as string,
		{VVA MOIS} as string,
		{VVA MOIS N-1} as string,
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE} as string,
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> venteDirecte
source(output(
		{Référence} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Prix Unitaire Std} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> partedisPrixStd
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixParPeriode
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file = {Nom Fournisseur Principal},
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		MKT1,
		MKT2,
		MKT3,
		Reference = {Reference Fournisseur},
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1},
		{Qté Livré Cumul A},
		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1},
		{VVA MOIS},
		{VVA MOIS N-1},
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE},
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = toInteger({Qté Livré Mois A}),
		yearmonth = trim(replace(split(path, "-")[3], ".xlsx", ""), " ")) ~> typeCaste
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIdNotNull
posIdNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> unique
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoin
LeftJoin filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Outer
cleansingVenteDirecte aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth_right,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté ventes directes} = sum({Qté ventes directes})) ~> uniqueKey
venteDirecte derive({Qté ventes directes} = toDouble({Qté facturée}),
		yearmonth_right = replace(yearmonth, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(Article, " ", ""),
		{Code client} = replace({Code client}, " ", "")) ~> cleansingVenteDirecte
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& Reference == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin
InnerJoin derive(Reference = replace(Reference," ",""),
		POSSAMidString = replace(POSSAMidString," ","")) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& Reference == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin
ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> leftOuter
eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin derive({Qté ventes directes} = iif({Qté ventes directes}<0, toDouble(0), {Qté ventes directes})) ~> rendreZeroLesVentesDirectesNegatives
rendreZeroLesVentesDirectesNegatives derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = {Qté Livré Mois A}-{Qté ventes directes}) ~> enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte
enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte, leftOuter union(byName: true)~> fullLeft
fullLeft select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file,
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		Reference,
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{VVA MOIS},
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> exctractYear
exctractYear filter(!isNull({Qté Livré Mois A})) ~> quantityNotNull
exctractYear filter(isNull({Qté Livré Mois A})) ~> quantityNull
partedisPrixStd select(mapColumn(
		Reference = {Référence},
		Article,
		{Prix Unitaire Std}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive({Uploading date} = currentDate(),
		Year = "2020") ~> uploadingDate
uploadingDate derive({Prix Unitaire Std} = toDouble({Prix Unitaire Std}),
		Year = toDouble(Year)) ~> prixStdToDouble
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Marque_file,
		agence_code = {Code Agence},
		{Code postal} = {Code postal agence},
		reference = Reference,
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté Livré Mois A},
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
quantityNotNull derive(canal = '',
		Dept = '') ~> Addcolumn
Outer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PARTEDIS_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OeccPartedis.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> quantityNullOutput
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PARTEDIS_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
